invalid-email: The email is invalid, please fill the email field correctly.
password-minlength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
password-uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
password-lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
password-number: Password must contain at least one number.
password-character: Password must contain at least one special character.
sign-up-error: Registration failed, please try the registration process again.
succes-register: You have successfully registered, please confirm the email you received and complete the authorization process.
